Description: NEW EVEN LOWER PRICE!!!!Barely used but tricked out Les Paul by Epiphone. Extras include Alumitone Lace humbucker pickups in the front and rear.Radical Lace Alumitone electric guitar pickups have less resistance and higher output with clear, big frequency response in a completely noise-free passive design. Constructed with aluminum rather than copper, Lace humbuckers have a current-driven design as opposed to conventional voltage-based pickups.Custom Klutson locking tuners installed.The Lace Alumitone humbucker's aluminum water jet cut exoskeleton is mated with a micro-winding using 90% less copper wire than traditional designs. The result is an extremely lightweight and efficient pickup for your guitar. Sonically, Lace Alumitone pickups have more volume, more bass, and more mids with nice, clear, smooth high-frequency response that cuts. FeaturesWater jet cut aluminum exoskeletonNoise-free current-driven designCopper micro-windingLightweight and efficientPassive circuitryLow resistanceHigh output Also, I have custom wired these pickups so you can switch from humbucking to single coil by a pull of the volume knobs. Also I have install authentic Klutson locking tuners on the head for that vintage look and ease of string change. It is a killer playing guitar which will play up against a Gibson any day! Over $300 in upgrades and work.
Title: Epiphone Les Paul Standard , Heritage Cherry, Alumitone Lace Pickups, More..
